DOC.brief_summary: This study is a retrospective chart review in patients diagnosed with headache or migraine to evaluate treatment patterns and diagnosis.
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Chart Review to Evaluate Diagnosis and Treatment of Chronic Migraine and Headache
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of chronic migraine or other diagnosis of migraine or headache for a minimum of 15 months Eight (8) headache days per month for at least 1 of the preceding 15 months Not currently diagnosed with chronic migraine, headache or migraine History of receiving botulinum toxin injections for the treatment of chronic migraine.
